conversations.description: User requests a beginner Spanish vocab list on food, receives words with translations, and listens to pronunciation audio for each.
Learner asks for an intermediate French fill‑in‑the‑blank exercise about travel, completes it, and receives instant feedback with a score.
User wants a German conversation prompt for ordering coffee, practices speaking, uploads audio, and gets detailed pronunciation feedback.
Student checks their progress, sees mastered Japanese kanji, and the coach suggests a new lesson on honorifics.
User schedules a daily 15‑minute Italian lesson for next week, receives a calendar reminder and a preview of the upcoming vocabulary.
Learner asks for an advanced English vocab match exercise on business terminology, completes it, and the coach updates the progress record.
User requests a Mandarin vocab list on hobbies at beginner level, receives audio clips for each word to practice tones.
Student selects a conversation prompt in Portuguese about booking a hotel, records their response, and receives a pronunciation score with tips.
User asks for a custom Spanish sentence‑fill exercise using their recent travel notes, completes it, and sees improvements highlighted.
Learner wants to review all vocabulary mastered in French at intermediate level, and the coach suggests a quick quiz.
